message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have the smaller share, but I'll get the bigger one!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not getting desperate yet!
I'm willing to compromise, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
You're getting close to the edge, but I'm still in control!
I'm willing to give a bit more, but don't think I'm going to get taken advantage of!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
Let's make a fair split, before it's too late!
